workflow.name: Twitter content automation with Gemini AI for tweets, images, and engagement
workflow.description:
### ## | N8N Workflow | AI-Powered Twitter Automation with Content Generation and Engagement üöÄ

*This n8n template automates Twitter (X) activity ‚Äî from generating tweet content with AI to engaging with posts and even sending DMs ‚Äî all powered by Google Gemini or OpenRouter AI.*

*It‚Äôs designed for creators, marketers, brands, and agencies who want to automate social media presence with authentic, on-brand AI content and engagement.*

## How It Works

- The workflow begins with a form trigger, where users input their topic, tone, and action type (Tweet, Engage, or DM).
- Those inputs are passed into Workflow Configuration, which sets key parameters like max tweet length and model URLs.
Depending on your chosen action:
- Post Tweet: AI generates a tweet under 280 characters and can attach an image.
- Engage with Posts: AI can like, retweet, or reply to niche-relevant content.
- Send Direct Message: AI drafts a personalized DM for outreach or networking.
- If your workflow includes visuals, the AI Agent - Create Image From Prompt node builds a detailed image prompt (based on your topic and instructions) and sends it to Google Gemini or other image APIs.
- The HTTP Request - Create Image node generates a custom image via an external model (default: Pollinations.ai).
- Finally, all tweet text and image data merge together in Merge Tweet Text and Image, before being posted directly via the Create Tweet node.
## How To Use

- Download and Import the JSON workflow into your n8n interface.
- Set up the following credentials:
- OpenRouter API for text generation.
- Google Gemini (PaLM) for chat and image prompt creation.
- Twitter OAuth2 API for posting and engagement actions.
- Configure your form input fields (Topic, Tone, Action, Instructions).

Enable or disable the nodes you want:

- Create Tweet ‚Üí To post automatically.
- Twitter Engagement Tool ‚Üí For likes/retweets/replies.
- Twitter DM Tool ‚Üí For automated DMs.
- Trigger the Twitter Content Form via n8n‚Äôs web interface.
- Enter your content preferences and submit.
- The workflow generates your tweet text, optionally creates a matching image, and posts or saves it automatically.

## Requirements

A Twitter Developer Account (with OAuth2 credentials).
A Google Gemini or OpenRouter account with text and image model access.
(Optional) Connection to Pollinations or another AI image generation API.

## How To Customize

- Update ‚ÄúFields ‚Äì Set Values‚Äù node to change:
- Default image size (1080 √ó 1920 px).
- Model name (e.g., ‚Äúflux‚Äù, ‚Äúturbo‚Äù, ‚Äúkontext‚Äù).
- Modify Workflow Configuration to tweak AI parameters like:
- imageGenerationChance (default: 0.3).
- maxTweetLength (default: 280).
- Replace Google Gemini Chat Model with any supported model such as OpenAI GPT-4 or Mistral.
- Adjust AI Agent - Create Image From Prompt system message for your preferred image style or guidelines.
- Toggle which Twitter actions are active ‚Äî Post, Engage, or DM ‚Äî to tailor automation to your goals.

user.value: ={{ $fromAI('recipient_username', 'The username to send the DM to', 'string') }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a Twitter automation assistant that helps create engaging content and manage Twitter interactions.

Your capabilities:
1. **Post Tweets**: Create compelling tweets based on the given topic, niche, and tone. Keep tweets under the specified character limit. You can include an image that is provided as input when posting the tweet. You do not create or generate images yourself.

parameters.jsonQuery:
={
  "width": {{ $('Fields - Set Values').item.json.width }},
  "height": {{ $('Fields - Set Values').item.json.height }},
  "model": "{{ $('Fields - Set Values').item.json.model }}",
  "seed": 42,
  "nologo": true
}

nodes.name: AI Agent - Create Image From Prompt

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI image-prompt creation expert. Please create a post using the following JSON format:
AI Image Generation Prompt Guidelines:
Objective
Create highly realistic, high‚Äêquality images
Ensure the image content faithfully conveys the spirit of the original text
Integrate short text (10‚Äì20 characters) naturally into the image
Maintain consistency and professionalism

Standard Prompt Structure
[Main Scene] | [Key Elements] | [Text Integration] | [Lighting & Atmosphere] | [Technical Parameters] | [Style Parameters]

Component Breakdown
1. Main Scene (Weight ::8)
Describe the primary setting in line with the content.
Examples:
Tech news: ‚Äúmodern tech office setting, minimalist workspace‚Äù
Economy news: ‚Äúprofessional financial district, corporate environment‚Äù
Education news: ‚Äúmodern classroom, advanced learning environment‚Äù

2. Key Elements (Weight ::8)
List the main visual elements required.
Examples:
‚Äúlarge HD display showing text ‚ÄòAI Ethics‚Äô in modern typography‚Äù
‚Äúprofessional people in business attire discussing around interactive screen‚Äù
‚Äúdetailed infographic elements floating in augmented reality style‚Äù

3. Text Integration (Weight ::7)
How to display text within the image:
text elements | elegant typography, clear readable text, integrated naturally into scene ::7

4. Lighting & Atmosphere (Weight ::7)
lighting | cinematic dramatic lighting, natural ambient light, professional studio setup ::7
background | depth of field blur, clean professional environment ::6

5. Technical Parameters
parameters | 8k resolution, hyperrealistic, photorealistic quality, octane render, cinematic composition --ar 16:9
settings | sharp focus, high detail, professional photography --s 1000 --q 2
Complete Examples
Example 1: AI Ethics News
professional tech conference room | large display showing "AI Ethics Now" in modern typography, group of diverse executives in discussion ::8 | clean modern workspace, glass walls, tech atmosphere ::7 | cinematic lighting, natural window light ::7 | 8k resolution, hyperrealistic quality, octane render --ar 16:9 --s 1000 --q 2
Example 2: Financial Market News
modern stock exchange environment | giant LED wall showing "Market Alert" in bold typography, professional traders in action ::8 | dynamic financial data visualization, sleek modern interior ::7 | dramatic lighting, blue-tinted atmosphere ::7 | 8k resolution, photorealistic quality --ar 16:9 --s 1000 --q 2

Additional Parameters
--chaos [0‚Äì100]: Adjust randomness
--stylize [0‚Äì1000]: Degree of stylization
--seed [number]: Ensure consistency across generations
--niji: Optimized for Asian‚Äêstyle aesthetics
--v 5.2: Use the latest model version

Important Notes
Text in Image
Keep it short and legible
Use professional fonts
Integrate naturally into the scene

Composition
Follow the rule of thirds
Ensure a clear focal point
Balance text and imagery

Color
Match a professional tone
Provide sufficient contrast for readability
Maintain visual consistency

Technical Details
Always use high resolution (8k)
Ensure professional lighting
Optimize for sharpness and detail

Common Pitfalls to Avoid
Overly generic prompts
Missing text‚Äêintegration guidance
Failing to specify composition rules
Omitting key technical parameters

The structure is:
{
  prompt_image {prompt : "" , ...}
}

tweetId.value: ={{ $fromAI('tweet_id', 'The ID of the tweet to like, retweet, or reply to', 'string') }}

parameters.content:
## **Image Generated Output**
This HTTP node returns the generated image as a binary (property: **imageData**). In the execution output, click **Binary > imageData > View** to preview.

**Heads-up:** Images are created via an external API (Pollinations). Check the service terms and ensure usage complies with your policies.

## Twitter Form & Config
**Trigger:** *Twitter Content Form* (public webhook path `twitter-content-form`)
**Config:** *Workflow Configuration* sets shared constants like `maxTweetLength` and image defaults.

**What to fill:**
- Choose **Tone** & **Action Type** (Post, Engage, DM)
- Add optional **Additional Instructions For Image(Prompt)**

**Security tip:** Protect the webhook (IP allow-list, secret path) for production.

## Twitter Content AI
**Nodes:** *Twitter AI Agent* ‚Üí *Process AI Response*

**Purpose:** Generates tweet text (and parameters for tools) from the form input. The AI output is passed forward; `Process AI Response` wraps it with metadata.

**Note:** The `twitterTool` nodes (Post/DM/Engage) are exposed to the AI via tool connectors. Ensure they are authorized before enabling in prod.

## Optional Image Generation Path
**Nodes:** *Fields - Set Values* ‚Üí *AI Agent - Create Image From Prompt* ‚Üí *Code - Clean Json* ‚Üí *Code - Get Prompt* ‚Üí *Code - Set Filename* ‚Üí *HTTP Request - Create Image*

**What it does:** Converts user "Additional Instructions" into **image prompts**, then calls an image API and attaches binary `imageData`.

**Usage in Tweets:** *Merge Tweet Text and Image* combines text + image. *Create Tweet* can then include the binary as an attachment.

**Tip:** Swap the image API URL or parameters to your preferred service.

## Posting/DM/Engagement
**Nodes:** *Twitter Post Tool*, *Twitter DM Tool*, *Twitter Engagement Tool*, *Create Tweet*

- **Create Tweet:** Posts the generated tweet text (and image when merged).
- **Post/DM/Engage Tools:** Can be invoked by the AI with structured arguments.

**Before publishing:**
- Connect your **Twitter/X credentials**.
- Test in a sandbox account.
- Respect rate limits and platform policies.

## Credentials & Environment
**Required:**
- **Reddit OAuth2** ‚Äì for search & commenting
- **Google Sheets OAuth2** ‚Äì for saving results
- **Google Gemini** ‚Äì for AI agents
- **Twitter/X** ‚Äì for posting/DM/engagement (if you enable those nodes)

**Set these in n8n Credentials** and test each connection.

**Note:** External image API (Pollinations) requires outbound HTTP; replace with your own if needed.

## Merge & Publish (Twitter)
**Node:** *Merge Tweet Text and Image*
Combines text from the AI with optional `imageData` from the image flow. Downstream *Create Tweet* will post the composed content.

**Tip:** If you want image-optional posting, add an IF check for `imageData` before Merge.

main.node: AI Agent - Create Image From Prompt

ai_languageModel.node: AI Agent - Create Image From Prompt

user.name: Kamran habib
user.bio: AI expert specializing in automation, workflow integration, and intelligent system design using tools like n8n, OpenAI, and custom APIs.
